product_name: Ben's 100 Max Formula Insect Repellent - 95 Percent DEET - 1.25 fl. oz.
long_description: Providing up to 10 hrs. of bug protection, Ben's 100 Max Formula insect repellent lets you enjoy the summer months without swatting flies and smacking mosquitoes. DEET (N, N-dimethyl-m-toluamide) is the most effective insect repellent available. Active ingredient 95% DEET offers an extremely high level of protection against mosquitoes, ticks, flies, chiggers, fleas and no-see-ums. Effectively repels insects that may carry West Nile Virus, Easter Equine Encephalitis, Lyme Disease, malaria and other infectious diseases.
short_description: Providing up to 10 hrs. of bug protection, Ben's 100 Max Formula insect repellent lets you enjoy the summer months without swatting flies and smacking mosquitoes.
